data.text: Esia nye nya si Yehowa gblɔ to Nyagblɔɖila Yeremia dzi ku ɖe Babilonia kple Babiloniatɔwo ƒe anyigba ŋuti:
“Miɖe gbeƒãe eye mido kpoe le dukɔwo dome,
Dukɔ si tso anyiehe la ava dze edzi
Yehowa be,
Woabia Zion ƒe mɔ ta ase
“Nye dukɔ le abe alẽ tatrawo ene,
Ame sia ame si ke ɖe wo ŋu la vuvua wo;
“Misi do go le Babilonia,
elabena made adã ta me na dukɔ
Ale Babilonia azu nuhaha
“Esi mi ame siwo nye avuzi le nye domenyinu dzi,
Ŋukpe gã aɖe ava mia dada dzi
Le Yehowa ƒe dziku helĩhelĩ ta la,
“Mi ame siwo daa aŋutrɔ,
Miɖe to ɖee miado ɣli ɖe eta!
Mitsrɔ̃ nukuƒãla kple nuŋela
“Israel nye alẽha si dzatawo ɖe ɖe nu, eye wokaka gbẽe.
Eya ta ale Yehowa, Dziƒoʋakɔwo ƒe Aƒetɔ, Israel ƒe Mawu la gblɔe nye esi:
Ke matrɔ Israel agbɔe va eya ŋutɔ
Yehowa be, “Le ŋkeke mawo me, le ɣe ma ɣi me,
Yehowa be,
Aʋaɣli le anyigba dzi, eye gbegblẽ gã si
Aleke woŋe, eye wohekaka anyigba blibo la ƒe zu ale!
O Babilonia, metre mɔ na wò
Yehowa ʋu eƒe aʋawɔnuwo ƒe ʋɔ
Mitso adzɔge miava ƒo ɖe edzi.
Miwu eƒe nyitsu viwo katã;
Miɖo to miase Babilonia ƒe aʋaléleawo
“Miyɔ aŋutrɔdalawo vɛ,
Eya ta eƒe ɖekakpuiwo aku akaka ɖe mɔtatawo dzi
Aƒetɔ Yehowa,
Dadala la akli nu adze anyi
Ale Yehowa, Dziƒoʋakɔwo ƒe Aƒetɔ la, gblɔe nye esi:
Evɔ la, woƒe Xɔnametɔ nye ŋusẽtɔ hafi,
Yehowa be, “Yi le Babiloniatɔwo yome!
Yi atso ɖe eƒe aʋatsonyagblɔɖilawo ŋu
Yi atso ɖe eƒe sɔwo, tasiaɖamwo kple amedzro
Kuɖiɖi neto eƒe tɔsisiwo me,
Yehowa be, “Ava eme be lã wɔadãwo
Anɔ ko abe ale si metsrɔ̃ Sodom kple Gomora
“Kpɔ ɖa! Aʋakɔ aɖe ho tso anyiehe gbɔna,
Wogbɔna kple aŋutrɔ kple akplɔ.
Babilonia fia se nya tso wo ŋu xoxo eye eƒe lãme fa.
Abe dzata si do go tso Yɔdan ƒe ave dodo me,
Eya ta se nu si Yehowa ɖo ɖe Babilonia ŋu
Babilonia xɔxɔ ƒe ɣli ana anyigba naʋuʋu,
